description:
Amid sea monsters and cross-dressing, Amelia and Gourry get caught up in the romantic drama of fishy Layla and her human boyfriend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Effet immédiat ? L`amour est à un pas !
Immediate Results? Love Is in the Tiny Differences
Koukatekimen? Koi no Yukue wa Kamihitoe!
Мгновенный эффект? Любовь таится в деталях!
効果覿面? 恋の行方は紙一重!
